reviewText: A first class performance, thoroughly entrancing. I bought after failing to get to see the live performance. So glad I did. An excellent resume of C S Lewis's life in a very humourous presentation.

Saw this presentation live with David Payne.  So glad to be able to get
the DVD.  If you like C.S. Lewis, you will enjoy this DVD/
Well done - Incite to the life of C.S.Lewis. Worth the purchase.

I am purchasing the DVD after seeing this performance live.  David Payne is amazing.  He never misses a beat and I felt like I had gone across the pond and back in time.  Look forward to watching this again and again.
